name: XenoDisc: Attack on Tokyo Bay
description:
XenoDisc: Attack on Tokyo Bay is a one player pinball game, in which you play as Raziel, a giant alien creature, taking vengeance upon humanity for experimenting on your brethren. Shoot your spinal discs at their feeble resistance and destroy the JSDF HQ at Tokyo Bay!

Controls:

Shooting

  • Hold Spacebar to charge your shot, release to shoot.
    • You can shoot up to three discs in a row.
  • While holding Spacebar...
    • Press Left Arrow or D to aim left.
    • Press Right Arrow or J to aim right.

Left Paddle:

  • Press A

Right Paddle:

  • Press L
